ModMetaData.name: Genepack Depletion
ModMetaData.author: PoorImpulseControl
ModMetaData.description:
This mod updates the xenogerm creation process, depleting the genepacks used based on the overall xenogerm complexity. You'll need to weigh your options a bit more carefully when creating new xenogerms and keep a few backup genepacks on hand, even if they are less than ideal.
By default you will lose between 15-25% of a genepack per point of complexity, so keep extracting those genes. Genepacks should recover 1% per day.
Settings can be adjusted from the options menu. This should be safe to add to existing games.
Future updates: - Vary the amount of depletion based on the crafting pawn's attributes. - Surface genepack status when selecting genepacks to combine. - Add technology to limit the depletion.
GitHub: https://github.com/dschoenberg/rimworld.genepack.depletion
